bibl.title: Historical and Literary Studies, Pagan, Jewish, and Christian. (New Testament Tools and Studies. VIII.)
bibl.note: Reproduction, avec des modifications parfois importantes, de 20 études parues entre 1945 et 1968.
bibl.seg: Metzger Bruce M., Historical and Literary Studies, Pagan, Jewish, and Christian. (New Testament Tools and Studies. VIII.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1968, 8°, x-170 pp. et 20 pll.
